text:
He struggled in silence. 

His thoughts consumed him. 

“Why can’t I escape?” 

He stared into the void. 

Days blurred into nights. 

Hope flickered like a dying flame. 

Yet, through it all, he pressed on. 

“Maybe tomorrow will be better.” 

He took a breath. 

Determined, he stepped forward. 

Each step felt heavy. 

But he moved, despite the weight. 

“Just keep going,” he whispered. 

The journey had just begun.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The key idea is that through adversity, one can achieve greatness.
